metadata.Title: CVE-2020-20896 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in function latm_write_packet in libavformat/latmenc.c in Ffmpeg 4.2.1, allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service or other unspecified impacts due to a Null pointer dereference.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-20896` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavcodec-extra58 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavcodec58 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavdevice58 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavfilter-extra7 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavfilter7 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavformat-extra - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavformat-extra58 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavformat58 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libavutil56 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libpostproc55 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libswresample3 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
libswscale5 - 7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: ccdm94> Xenial seems to not be vulnerable to this issue. The commit that introduces the code addressed in the fix commit (dd01947397b) is 8b3ec51de8a (3.4). In this commit, the lines that were added in the fix were removed. The package code in Xenial does not include the changes added by 8b3ec51de8a, and therefore, code reintroduced by the fix to this CVE is already present.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.3.1-4ubuntu1').
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
